• We're really excited to tell you that this version of the Choice Hotels app has support for 3D Touch! Keeping your convenience in mind, we have added the ability to search for hotels near your current location, jump right into your upcoming reservations or account screen from the home screen if you have iPhone 6s or 6s+!
• A new “Today” widget! Made a reservation? Easily see your upcoming reservation and get directions to the hotel by using your device’s Notification Center. Swipe down from the device’s status bar and tap “Edit” to add the Choice Hotels widget to the Notification Center.
• Share your favorite hotels with friends and family with the click of a Share button on the Hotel Details page.
• Bug fixes and performance enhancements based on user feedback. Thank you for helping us improve our app!

• We're really excited to tell you that this version of the Choice Hotels app has support for 3D Touch! Keeping your convenience in mind, we have added the ability to search for hotels near your current location, jump right into your upcoming reservations or account screen from the home screen if you have iPhone 6s or 6s+!
• A new “Today” widget! Made a reservation? Easily see your upcoming reservation and get directions to the hotel by using your device’s Notification Center. Swipe down from the device’s status bar and tap “Edit” to add the Choice Hotels widget to the Notification Center.
• Share your favorite hotels with friends and family with the click of a Share button on the Hotel Details page.
• Bug fixes and performance enhancements based on user feedback. Thank you for helping us improve our app!

• We're really excited to tell you that this version of the Choice Hotels app has support for 3D Touch! Keeping your convenience in mind, we have added the ability to search for hotels near your current location, jump right into your upcoming reservations or account screen from the home screen if you have iPhone 6s or 6s+!
• A new “Today” widget! Made a reservation? Easily see your upcoming reservation and get directions to the hotel by using your device’s Notification Center. Swipe down from the device’s status bar and tap “Edit” to add the Choice Hotels widget to the Notification Center.
• Share your favorite hotels with friends and family with the click of a Share button on the Hotel Details page.
• Bug fixes and performance enhancements based on user feedback. Thank you for helping us improve our app!

• We are excited to announce that you can now book our new Choicehotels.com Exclusive Member Rate on the app. It is a free and easy way to book a room that has our “Best Price Guarantee”.
• Now you can book even faster with RapidBook! Complete your profile information and you will be able to book a room in only a few simple taps.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements based on user feedback. Thank you for helping us improve our app!

The next generation of the Choice Hotels App is here, and we really think you are going to love it!
 
All the improvements won’t fit in this small space, but here are just a few that you will notice right away.  
 
-A totally personalized home screen experience
-Simplified navigation makes finding what you need even easier
-Better views of our hotels with larger search results photos
-More detailed descriptions of each property
-A quicker, user-friendly booking experience

The app was designed with you, the user, in mind. We value your feedback, so please let us know what you think of the upgrades.

Thanks for traveling connected with the Choice Hotels App! We update the app as often as possible in order to provide you the best experience.
 
In this release, we added Apple Wallet integration for your upcoming stays. Thank you for letting us know that you missed that feature. We also cleaned up some bugs and made some performance improvements.
 
We read all your feedback and appreciate you taking the time to let us know how we are doing.

We regularly update the app to add new features and to make it more reliable.
Now you can easily view your invoices for past stays. This update also includes several bug fixes and performance improvements.
 
If you love using the app, let us know by rating us in the app store.

Summer travel season is right around the corner. Have you booked your vacation yet? 
 
To ensure you travel connected when you hit the road, we loaded this update with some new features that we think you will like.
 
-Do you ever have trouble finding your favorite hotels? Well not anymore! Now you can easily add hotels you like to the "My Favorites List".
-Tell your family and friends that you are on your way to visit them. Now you can easily share your upcoming reservations.
-Looking for a unique package deal at some of our properties? Now you can book promotional rates directly in the app.
-We also cleaned up some minor bugs and made other enhancements that we believe you will appreciate. 
 
Do you love using this app? Let us know by leaving us a review.

As a Choice Hotels app user, you always travel connected to the lowest prices and instant rewards. We want you to focus your time on your next great stay, not worrying about login issues. That is why this release includes Touch ID capability so you can quickly, and securely, access your account using fingerprint recognition.
 
Do you love using the app? Is there anything we can do to improve your experience? Let us know by leaving some feedback.

Thank you for using the Choice Hotels Mobile App. We make regular updates to ensure that we are meeting all your travel needs. This update includes a variety of page enhancements, including a new condensed view for search results. This new view will allow you to see more properties on your screen at once.

Our team has been working hard to improve your app because we know how important it is to travel connected to your next great stay. Users let us know that after they book a room, they are curious what is nearby. We now have you covered. In this update, we added a nearby attraction list to your upcoming stays page. Easily find restaurants, transportation and more. We also fixed some bugs and enhanced a few other pages.
Enjoying the app? Let us know by leaving us some feedback.

We are quickly approaching fall. It's that great time of year when there is pumpkin spice everything, leaves changing colors, football to watch, and hopefully, a fun fall getaway to enjoy. When you travel connected, by using the Choice Hotels app, you will notice the updates to the "My Stays" section as well some other page enhancements.
Are you enjoying the convenience of using the app? Let us know by leaving feedback. Safe travels!

The cold weather outside serves as a great reminder that the holidays are approaching way too fast and that now is a perfect time to book your winter getaway to see your family and friends. This update includes enhancements that will make booking rooms and modifying reservations even easier. Also, we heard that many of you missed our 3D Touch options, so we brought them back as fast as we could.
 
We can't reveal the details just yet but stay tuned to the app in the coming weeks. We will be giving you a chance to win lots of free Choice Privileges points!

With each update, we aim to make your mobile experience even smoother. When you travel during the holiday season, feel confident that you can book and manage your stays from anywhere at any time. We understand app bugs are always annoying and get in the way of productivity, so we cleaned a bunch of those up in this update. Safe travels and Happy Holidays!

You don't want to miss this promotion! We are giving away over 10 million Choice Privileges® Points to mobile app users. Download and register for the "Tap the App" sweepstakes to try and grab your share. Enter every day for the most chances to win and don't forget to tell your friends. (Just make sure they take you on vacation with them if they win.)

We want to be your go-to travel app. That is why we make frequent updates to ensure we are meeting your expectations. Now you can order food and earn points! Head to your "My Rewards" page and look for this new feature. Also, don't forget to enter the "Tap the App" sweepstakes every day through February 11th for the most chances to win lots and lots of points.

There are no large feature releases in this update, but that doesn't mean you shouldn't get excited about this new app version. Each time you update your app, you should notice it gets a bit faster, more reliable, and also better looking.
How are we doing? Let us know by leaving a review.

Another update, another round of app improvements aimed at making travel less stressful. Your upcoming stay details will now be front and center. 24 hours before your next stay you will notice your home screen will show you essential information for your reservation.
